                     PLOT                    
    
                                                                     
      Sunshine, an idyllic and almost forgotten island under         
      British rule, is shortly to become independent. But a few      
      days before this event is to take place, the British           
      governor of the island is shot. Her Majesty's secret service   
      is called in and Sam McCready asks Desmond Hannah of           
      Scotland Yard to take charge of the case. When Hannah          
      arrives on Sunshine, he notices the subdued atmosphere of      
      fear reigning there.
